name: To plant a bug
description:
A detective strategy game, HOPA, pixelart.

You are a novice neodetective, you are assigned a responsible task - to find a criminal cryptominer. You have bugs with which you can find servers in the rooms of the victims!

Control:

Alt/Z/J (= A on gameboy) - the following text, interaction with the detective

Enter (= Start on gameboy) - start the game after joining,

Shift (= Select on gameboy) - install a bug, select a room, select an item

Ctrl/K/X (= B on gameboy) - open inventory

ArrowUp/W (=Up on gameboy) - up

ArrowDown/S (= Down on gameboy) - down

ArrowLeft/A (= Left on gameboy) - left

ArrowRight/D (= Right on gameboy) - right


Game designer - Arina Goryachena, programmers - Maxim Popov and Andrey Andreychuk, artist - Rovena Gasanova.
